name: Recursive Hate - Spider Hell
description:
Welcome to a sinister alien research station where abducted humans must participate in alien's experiments.

Try to survive in Spider Hell




Survival versus big, realistic and terrifying spiders and versus swarms with literally thousands of spiders.

Spiders - goliath spiders, tarantulas, venomous black widows, jumpy spiders, etc.



Weapons - rifles, pistol, shotgun, grenade launcher and the most important - flamethrower. Burn them all!!!

Bunny massacre


All those spiders have to eat, right? You'll figure out what to do.
